verses.verse: וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- now if זֶ֥בַח <WH2077> Ze-vach [be] a sacrifice שְׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> she-la-Mim of peace offering קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <WH7133> ka-re-ba-No; And if his oblation אִ֤ם <WH518> 'im if מִן־ <WH4480> min- out הַבָּקָר֙ <WH1241> hab-ba-Kar [it] of the herd ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu he מַקְרִ֔יב <WH7126> mak-Riv, if he offer אִם־ <WH518> 'im- whether זָכָר֙ <WH2145> za-Char whether [it be] a male אִם־ <WH518> 'im- or נְקֵבָ֔ה <WH5347> ne-ke-Vah, or female תָּמִ֥ים <WH8549> ta-Mim it without blemish יַקְרִיבֶ֖נּוּ <WH7126> yak-ri-Ven-nu he shall offer לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

וְסָמַ֤ךְ <WH5564> ve-sa-Mach And he shall lay יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> rosh upon the head קָרְבָּנ֔וֹ <WH7133> ka-re-ba-No, of his offering וּשְׁחָט֕וֹ <WH7819> u-she-cha-To and kill פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach it [at] the door אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְזָרְק֡וּ <WH2236> ve-za-re-Ku shall sprinkle בְּנֵי֩ <WH1121> be-Nei sons אַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron's הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim the priests אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדָּ֛ם <WH1818> had-Dam the blood עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. round about

וְהִקְרִיב֙ <WH7126> ve-hik-Riv And he shall offer מִזֶּ֣בַח <WH2077> miz-Ze-vach of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֔ים <WH8002> hash-she-la-Mim, of the peace offering אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> 'ish-Sheh an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> ha-Che-lev the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> ham-chas-Seh that covereth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַקֶּ֔רֶב <WH7130> hak-Ke-rev, the inwards וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הַחֵ֔לֶב <WH2459> ha-Che-lev, and all the fat אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is on הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <WH7130> hak-Ke-rev. that [is] upon the inwards

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> she-Tei And the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <WH3629> hak-ke-la-Yot, kidneys וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> ha-Che-lev and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עֲלֵהֶ֔ן <WH5921> 'a-le-Hen, and אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is on הַכְּסָלִ֑ים <WH3689> hak-ke-sa-Lim; that [is] on them which [is] by the flanks וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3508> hai-yo-Te-ret and the caul עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- of הַכָּבֵ֔ד <WH3516> hak-ka-Ved, above the liver עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- with הַכְּלָי֖וֹת <WH3629> hak-ke-la-Yot with the kidneys יְסִירֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5493> ye-si-Ren-nah. it shall he take away

וְהִקְטִ֨ירוּ <WH6999> ve-hik-Ti-ru shall burn אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> o-To בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- sons אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron And Aaron's הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-chah, it on the altar עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הָ֣עֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah, upon the burnt sacrifice אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is on הָעֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> ha-'e-Tzim which [is] upon the wood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is on הָאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> ha-'Esh; that [is] on the fire אִשֵּׁ֛ה <WH801> 'ish-Sheh [it is] an offering made by fire רֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> ni-Cho-ach of a sweet לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto the LORD פ Peh

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if מִן־ <WH4480> min- is from הַצֹּ֧אן <WH6629> hatz-Tzon [be] of the flock קָרְבָּנ֛וֹ <WH7133> ka-re-ba-No And if his offering לְזֶ֥בַח <WH2077> le-Ze-vach for a sacrifice שְׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> she-la-Mim of peace offering לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; God זָכָר֙ <WH2145> za-Char male א֣וֹ <WH176> o or נְקֵבָ֔ה <WH5347> ne-ke-Vah, or female תָּמִ֖ים <WH8549> ta-Mim it without blemish יַקְרִיבֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH7126> yak-ri-Ven-nu. he shall offer

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If כֶּ֥שֶׂב <WH3775> Ke-sev a lamb הֽוּא־ <WH1931> hu- he מַקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> mak-Riv If he offer אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <WH7133> ka-re-ba-No; for his offering וְהִקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> ve-hik-Riv then shall he offer אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei it before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

וְסָמַ֤ךְ <WH5564> ve-sa-Mach And he shall lay אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> rosh upon the head קָרְבָּנ֔וֹ <WH7133> ka-re-ba-No, of his offering וְשָׁחַ֣ט <WH7819> ve-sha-Chat and kill אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> o-To, לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei it before אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְ֠זָרְקוּ <WH2236> Ve-za-re-ku shall sprinkle בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> be-Nei sons אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron's אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דָּמ֛וֹ <WH1818> da-Mo the blood עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. thereof round about

וְהִקְרִ֨יב <WH7126> ve-hik-Riv And he shall offer מִזֶּ֣בַח <WH2077> miz-Ze-vach of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִים֮ <WH8002> hash-she-la-Mim of the peace offering אִשֶּׁ֣ה <WH801> 'ish-Sheh an offering made by fire לַיהוָה֒ <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD חֶלְבּוֹ֙ <WH2459> chel-Bo the fat הָאַלְיָ֣ה <WH451> ha-'al-Yah rump תְמִימָ֔ה <WH8549> te-mi-Mah, thereof [and] the whole לְעֻמַּ֥ת <WH5980> le-'um-Mat hard הֶעָצֶ֖ה <WH6096> he-'a-Tzeh by the backbone יְסִירֶ֑נָּה <WH5493> ye-si-Ren-nah; it shall he take off וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> ha-Che-lev and the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> ham-chas-Seh that covereth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַקֶּ֔רֶב <WH7130> hak-Ke-rev, the inwards וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הַחֵ֔לֶב <WH2459> ha-Che-lev, and all the fat אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is on הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <WH7130> hak-Ke-rev. that [is] upon the inwards

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> she-Tei And the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <WH3629> hak-ke-la-Yot, kidneys וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> ha-Che-lev and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עֲלֵהֶ֔ן <WH5921> 'a-le-Hen, and אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is on הַכְּסָלִ֑ים <WH3689> hak-ke-sa-Lim; that [is] upon them which [is] by the flanks וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3508> hai-yo-Te-ret and the caul עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- of הַכָּבֵ֔ד <WH3516> hak-ka-Ved, above the liver עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- with הַכְּלָיֹ֖ת <WH3629> hak-ke-la-Yot with the kidneys יְסִירֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5493> ye-si-Ren-nah. it shall he take away

וְהִקְטִיר֥וֹ <WH6999> ve-hik-ti-Ro shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen And the priest הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-chah; it upon the altar לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem [it is] the food אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> 'ish-Sheh of the offering made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto the LORD פ Peh

וְאִ֥ם <WH518> ve-'Im if עֵ֖ז <WH5795> 'ez [be] a goat קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <WH7133> ka-re-ba-No; And if his offering וְהִקְרִיב֖וֹ <WH7126> ve-hik-ri-Vo then he shall offer לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei it before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

וְסָמַ֤ךְ <WH5564> ve-sa-Mach And he shall lay אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> ro-Sho, upon the head וְשָׁחַ֣ט <WH7819> ve-sha-Chat of it and kill אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> o-To, לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei it before אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְ֠זָרְקוּ <WH2236> Ve-za-re-ku shall sprinkle בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> be-Nei and the sons אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דָּמ֛וֹ <WH1818> da-Mo the blood עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach thereof upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. round about

וְהִקְרִ֤יב <WH7126> ve-hik-Riv And he shall offer מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu at קָרְבָּנ֔וֹ <WH7133> ka-re-ba-No, thereof his offering אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> 'ish-Sheh [even] an offering made by fire לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> ha-Che-lev the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> ham-chas-Seh that covereth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַקֶּ֔רֶב <WH7130> hak-Ke-rev, the inwards וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הַחֵ֔לֶב <WH2459> ha-Che-lev, and all the fat אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is on הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <WH7130> hak-Ke-rev. that [is] upon the inwards

וְהִקְטִירָ֥ם <WH6999> ve-hik-ti-Ram shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen And the priest הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-chah; them upon the altar לֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem [it is] the food אִשֶּׁה֙ <WH801> 'ish-Sheh of the offering made by fire לְרֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> le-Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <WH5207> ni-Cho-ach, for a sweet כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all חֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> Che-lev all the fat לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. [is] the LORD'S

חֻקַּ֤ת <WH2708> chuk-Kat statute עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> o-Lam [It shall be] a perpetual לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> le-do-Ro-tei-Chem, for your generations בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> be-Chol all מֽוֹשְׁבֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4186> mo-she-vo-tei-Chem; throughout all your dwellings כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any חֵ֥לֶב <WH2459> Che-lev neither fat וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol any דָּ֖ם <WH1818> dam nor blood לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not תֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> to-Che-lu. that ye eat פ Peh
